post_text: September 26, 2015 at 11:27â€¯PM#1Is there a way to make a macro that can change the high and low valeu of a coloreffect by selecting the value's?In example:1. make a color effect with as low value color 1(white) and as high value color 2(yellow)2. Assign it to an executor.3. Run the macro4. Click than Color 3(blue)5. Click than Color 4(amber)6. The coloreffect is now blue amber instead of color 1(White) and color 2(yellow)
title: Flexible color effect
